pageContext.claim: “And as bad as those premiums are, we've kept the premiums down.”
pageContext.analysis: On average, premiums on plans purchased through the Obamacare exchanges increased 37 percent in 2018. In 2019, they are expected to decline, increasing only nine percent, as insurers are rejoining the exchanges. The uncertainty created by the Republican attempts to repeal the ACA previously led insurers to flee.
